title: Still Waters
description: A reformed nix. Drakjan has been living as a harmless freshwater merman for so long he sometimes almost believes in the lie himself. Almost.A deadly hunter.Hraban has dedicated his life to taking down creatures like Drakjan, protecting those who cannot protect themselves.An uneasy truce.When fate forces them together, the nix and the hunter discover a dangerous attractionâ€¦ and a threat that can destroy everything Drakjan has come to love. 24,000 words
author: Alex Gabriel
